imdb.title: Bokura ga ita
imdb.plot: Nanami Takahashi is a high school student entering her first year. Immediately on her first day however, she becomes the victim of a practical joke by the school's most popular guy, Motoharu Yano, who coincidentally also ends up i...

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.plot: With she and Motoharu finally alone at his house, Nanami gets the nerve up to make the move. Everything is dreamy ... until his mom comes home early. After that, he decides save up some money, and maybe get a room...

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.plot: When Yuri's bag is knocked over, Nanami impulsively steals an old photo of Motoharu together with Yuri, and now she's not sure what to do. But when Motoharu finds the picture in Nanami's notebook, he decides to return it to Yuri himself.

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.plot: Nanami and Motoharu's study session is interrupted when Yuri turns up on Motoharu's doorstep with some important news about her sister. Naturally, Nanami isn't thrilled about it, and the two end up in a fight...

episodes.title: Episode 12
episodes.plot: Motoharu finally confesses to Nanami about his time with Yuri ... and now she can't even face him. But when do they finally make up, they decide to go to the beach together. Bad idea?

episodes.title: Episode 13
episodes.plot: It's over between Nanami and Motoharu, and a week has already passed. Takeuchi, who just can't let things be, invites Nanami over to cheer her up. Meanwhile, Motoharu is starting to regret what happened...

episodes.title: Episode 14
episodes.plot: With Motoharu and Nanami's relationship at a standstill, Takeuchi decides to take the initiative ... but his timing couldn't be any worse. Or could it?

episodes.title: Episode 15
episodes.plot: With the annual Cultural Festival approaching, everyone is busy, but things between Nanami, Motoharu, and Takeuchi are motionless. While Motoharu deals with his feelings for Nanami, Takeuchi is planning something, and soon!

episodes.title: Episode 16
episodes.plot: With everyone anxiously awaiting the main event of the school festival, Takeuchi plans his confession to Nanami, at the same time as Motoharu! Nanami is feeling overwhelmed and decides to escape.

episodes.title: Episode 17
episodes.plot: Nanami finally decides to get back together with Motoharu-under one condition: he must tell her everything about his first love, Nana. When they go out on a date, Nanami brings along Takeuchi, hoping he'll get Motoharu to spill the tea.

episodes.title: Episode 18
episodes.plot: Motoharu decides to tell Nanami everything, so he invites her out for a chat, which soon feels more like a date. But things turn serious when he finally opens up ... and it's not what Nanami wants to hear.

episodes.title: Episode 19
episodes.plot: Nanami and Motoharu are finally back together, and they've returned to their normal school routine. But with Nanami in the middle of Motoharu and Takeuchi's rivalry, things are still super awkward!

episodes.title: Episode 20
episodes.plot: Motoharu is angry after Takeuchi starts dating his classmate, even though he doesn't like her. Later, Nanami and Motoharu are having a great day out on a date ... until Yuri shows up. But does it really matter anymore?

episodes.title: Episode 21
episodes.plot: With Nanami's parents out of town, she takes the opportunity to invite Motoharu for a sleepover. Enthusiastic Motoharu is thrilled, until he receives a call from an upset Yuri. Meanwhile Takeuchi is on a date and Nanami is on his mind.

episodes.title: Episode 22
episodes.plot: Nanami is still waiting for Motoharu, but Takeuchi gives in to his feelings and offers to take her home. When Motoharu finally gets there, the two are long gone. Later, he tries to apologize before collapsing from a cold.

episodes.title: Episode 23
episodes.plot: Motoharu and Takeuchi both have big news ... for each other! Nanami is really feeling uncertain about what's happening between her and Motoharu, especially after Yuri and Takeuchi got involved. Could it really be over between them?

episodes.title: Episode 24
episodes.plot: With Christmas around the corner, Nanami is preoccupied with presents, even though she hasn't made up with Motoharu, while Motoharu considers moving to Tokyo with his mother. What's going to happen when it's time for college?

episodes.title: Episode 25
episodes.plot: Nanami is studying like crazy for the University entrance exams, but she's starting to have doubts about her chances of being accepted. To make her even more nervous, Motoharu still hasn't given her an answer about Tokyo. Aaaaaargh!!!

episodes.title: Episode 26
episodes.plot: In this bittersweet season finale, Christmas is only a few weeks away. After Motoharu's stunning announcement that he's moving to Tokyo, he and Nanami are spending as much time together before the holiday ... and their future apart.
